channel.title: Spatiotemporal smoothing on Mauricio Tec
channel.description: Recent content in Spatiotemporal smoothing on Mauricio Tec

item.title: Spatiotemporal GFL images
item.description:
Below are some images, produced with ggplot2, for our work on spatiotemporal smoothing with the graph-fused lasso.
The figures on the left (red) show the productivity (dollars per hour) at the airport, and the figures at the right in downtown (blue). The two top figures show the models without postprocessing, and the bottom two use Bernstein polynomials smoothing and 400 degrees of freedom. To do The image may improve using facet instead of four separate gifs
